statements: UPDATE inventory_turnover_policy SET quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE Orders SET order_date = '2022-11-30', order_quantity = 10 WHERE order_id = 101;

UPDATE turnover_policies SET max_quantity = 50, max_turnover_rate = 0.6 WHERE policy_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 29.99 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE inventory SET quantity_in_stock = 50, reorder_level = 10 WHERE product_id = 200

UPDATE orders SET quantity_ordered = quantity_ordered - 5, order_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE order_id = 201;
